name: mithril-markdown-wysiwyg
description: A WYSIWYG markdown editor for Mithril.js

scripts.release:patch: pnpm -C packages/lib version patch && pnpm release:lib
scripts.release:minor: pnpm -C packages/lib version minor && pnpm release:lib
scripts.release:major: pnpm -C packages/lib version major && pnpm release:lib
